items.title: NTPC Green Energy IPO offers a valuable lesson for PSUs in value creation
items.description: The IPO values NTPC Green Energy at Rs 91,000 crore to 1 lakh crore, generating value for NTPC investors and setting the to-be-listed company on an independent path

items.title: Crompton Greaves Consumer Electricals Q2: Robust growth in spite of challenges
items.description: Focus on premium product portfolio amid festive season and the revival in lighting will be key growth drivers
